Henry (son) Unnamed child }} '''Michelle Burke''' is the only daughter of [[Richard Burke|Dr. Richard Burke]] and his ex-wife, [[Barbara Burke]]. She never appears on screen, but her voice is heard on the phone in ''Friends'' season 3 episode "[[The One Where No One's Ready]]". The actress who voiced the character was not credited and is unknown. ==Biography== ===[[Season 2]]=== [[Monica Geller]] and Michelle went to high school together. When Monica and Richard begin dating, she almost lets it slip that Michelle got drunk at their high school graduation. Richard also reveals that Michelle had a two year old son, Henry, and was pregnant with her second child at the time. ===[[Season 3]]=== Michelle left a message on the answering machine of her father, who just broke up with Monica. Monica calls Richard, but wants to check her message and hears the message from Michelle while doing so. She calls Michelle to make sure that it was her and not another woman Richard started dating, but she accidentally lets it slip that she checked Richard's machine, which gets Michelle upset. ("[[The One Where No One's Ready]]") [[Category:Friends Characters|Burke, Michelle]] [[Category:Season 3 Characters|Burke, Michelle]] [[Category:Unseen Characters|Burke, Michelle]] [[Category:Mothers|Burke, Michelle]] [[Category:Females|Burke, Michelle]] [[Category:Lincoln High School|Burke, Michelle]] [[Category:Characters|Burke, Michelle]]
